sentences.english: The character likely has hundreds or even thousands of vassals .
sentences.chinese: 人物可能擁有成百上千的奴僕。

sentences.english: Will he make a covenant with thee? wilt thou take him for a servant for ever?
sentences.chinese: 豈肯與你立約，使你拿它永遠作奴僕嗎。

sentences.english: "- the people's victim and life-long bond-slave, as they fancied her, might say to them.
sentences.chinese: 人們心目中的這個犧牲品和終身奴僕會對他們這樣說。

sentences.english: We are now my lord's slaves--we ourselves and the one who was found to have the cup.
sentences.chinese: 我們與那在他手中搜出杯來的都是我主的奴僕。

sentences.english: And deliver them who through fear of death were all their lifetime subject to bondage.
sentences.chinese: 並要釋放那些一生因怕死而爲奴僕的人。

sentences.english: We are now my lord's slavers-we ourselves and the one who was found to have the cup.
sentences.chinese: 我們與那在他手中搜出杯來的都是我主的奴僕。

sentences.english: For when ye were the servants of sin, ye were free from righteousness.
sentences.chinese: 你們作罪的奴僕的時候，就不受義的約束。

sentences.english: True freedom is found in bondage to Christ.
sentences.chinese: 只有基督的奴僕纔有真自由。

sentences.english: Become Thy cowherd and Thy slave.
sentences.chinese: 成爲你的牧牛者和奴僕吧。

sentences.english: The slave was very productive, giving birth to three sons and two daughters.
sentences.chinese: 娶來的奴僕很能生育，嗣有三男兩女。

sentences.english: I hope that he isn’tplanning on turning us into servants or slaves.
sentences.chinese: 我可不希望他把我們都貶爲奴僕。

sentences.english: It’s saying that everyone is a spiritual servant or slave to something.
sentences.chinese: 每個人從精神上講，實際都是某些東西的奴僕。

sentences.english: Mt. 10:24 A disciple is not above the teacher, nor a slave above his master.
sentences.chinese: 太十24門徒並不高過老師，奴僕也不高過主人。

sentences.english: Ever look on everyone as slave of money's, however, it is a world filled with love assuredly.
sentences.chinese: 曾以爲人都是錢的奴僕，原來這卻是個愛的世界。

sentences.english: And he breathes out fast, like a king banishing a servant.
sentences.chinese: 他呼氣則非常迅速，像一個國王驅逐自己的奴僕。

sentences.english: And he said, I am a young man of Egypt, servant to an Amalekite ;
sentences.chinese: 他回答說，我是埃及的少年人，是亞瑪力人的奴僕。

definition: Holy Father/God the Father (in the Christian Trinity)
trustworthy/reliable/to believe something to be true
Jehovah (biblical name for God, Hebrew: YHWH)/compare Yahweh 雅威[Ya3 wei1] and God 上帝[Shang4 di4]
